@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+import torch
+from torch.autograd import Function
+
+
+class Bilinear(Function):
+
+    def forward(self, input1, input2, weight, bias=None):
+        self.save_for_backward(input1, input2, weight, bias)
+
+        output = input1.new()
+
+        self.buff2 = input1.new()
body: Removing `self` from `buff2` isn't working as expected. We are using `self.buff2` in `backward` that we initialized in forward. We can remove it from `buff1` though. Do you want me to do it?
